website_summaries.verdict: A high-end canopy that's built to last. A good choice for those who may be out in light storms.
pros: Can withstand the weather better than others, including moderate wind
cons: The frame is heavy and can be tough to set up

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice so far. Setting up really is a 2 man operation. I did it by myself, but it took a while... going to each corner to raise it a little at a time. Taking it down was 1 man easy. Seems to be sturdy, but I got this one because it was "commercial", but i have no basis to know the difference. Also i got the same brand, sand bag holder, although I filled it with gravel. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: AzzTek

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It arrived without the bottom and wheels to the cart cover. Unfortunately it was not discovered at time of delivery because we were and are dealing with our son's stage 4 cancer. So we placed the shippment in storage until now. Needless to say, when we opened the box to discover parts missing we weren't too thrilled. I haven't even had a chance to check the rest of it out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: StormyDays

customer_reviews.title: I love this tent
customer_reviews.text: I use this tent ALL the time. I sell products at the farmer's market and use it twice a week. It is super durable, holding up to rough use. It is the easiest tent to put up and take down that I have ver used. I have other vendors ask me all the time what tent it is and where I got it. I recommend this tent to everyone. I plan on purchasing more tents from them for additional markets.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well built canopy
customer_reviews.text: I used the Eurmax first time this past weekend for 2 days at a steak competition. It was a breeze to set up. Very smooth leg action and canopy cloth is great. Heavy duty for my needs. My 5 foot tall wife was able to to help with set up. I think it would be a challenge for one person but could be done. For tie downs on asphalt use 2 2-1/2 ga water jugs on 2 opposite corners with 2 each, using the supplied take down strips. I love the canopy and am planning in getting the side walls for rainy days. This should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dsw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product . Price Was Good . I Used Another Brand Canopy But It Didn't Last Long .
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent. We purchased it for use on the beach. We have used it most of the summer and it has held up great. It is easy to put up with 4 people and we can have it set up in less than 10 minutes. It will take a little longer with 2 people and almost impossible to put up by yourself so have some one with you. We did purchase extra stakes and a heavy mallet for the stakes in the sand and are very happy with this purchase. It is very well built and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Colors are beautiful, held up well durning the wind and rain. The tents were the perfect size for our event.
customer_reviews.author: City of Columbia Employee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I own a biz where I do quite a few grassroot events. I bought one of those less expensive slanted leg texts and it broke after the first use. This one is heavy duty, easy to put up. A bit heavy and you need an SUV or truck to transport. But it's so much higher quality and will definitely last me a while. I love this tent!
customer_reviews.author: MAJ

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than other canopies, but for the price, can't beat the quality and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: Best canopy I ever owned!! My other canopies could not handle any winds greater than 10mph. These have proven to hold up to constant 18mph with gusts up to 24mph...you may ask how do I know the MPH's, well I run a weather system at the drag races and my weather station gives me pretty accurate weather conditions with MPH's. Now the warning label on this canopy says good up to 10mph and must take down if winds are any higher, but I've tried it at higher MPH's and it stays together!...awesome canopy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SG NHRA

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than others???
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed with this product. At farmers market a wind came up and snaped one side of the canapy. My canapy was in-between three other cheaper Shopko canapies and these cheaper ones had no damage. Why would my canapy be the only one that got broke, especially when mine should have been stronger?
customer_reviews.author: Christina Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice canopy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put up - literally takes a few minutes. Held up in the rain - everyone stayed dry. Very good construction and solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, good materials
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Pop catches are sturdy and easy to operate. Fabric is several grades above big box store offerings. Carry/rolling bag has heavy duty zipper and fabric. Very happy with easy of setup. Possible with one person.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle 1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. We have a custom top from Epic ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. We have a custom top from Epic Advertising and it fits perfectly! Even has the middle bar to keep the top at a point (our cheap one from Sports Authority did not...).
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Everything went great until we tried to pack it up
customer_reviews.text: Everything went great until we tried to pack it up. Had 4 people trying to follow the instructions but the base was messed up and wouldn’t fold back in. Had to leave it at coachella. Waste of 130 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Amoroso

customer_reviews.title: Love it! We had a similar one for our ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We had a similar one for our business years ago that cost hundreds of dollars. This one seems even better, and folds into its cover so easily. We were thrilled with the price. We will beat this thing up in the future, but the quality looks like it will hold up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: P. Colgan

customer_reviews.title: This thing was HUGE- way taller than a typical canopy ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was HUGE- way taller than a typical canopy, and about 5'+ tall when completely collapsed, also it weighs a ton! It was over 60 lbs on our scale
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great tent! The quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! The quality is excellent, stitching, durabilty, frame is heavy duty. This has worked great every time we have used it. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Welch

customer_reviews.title: The metal is heavy unsure why the canopy has a small tear.
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent but the top has already ripped.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great strong canopy that's easy to set up and break down. So far it's been used twice.
customer_reviews.author: Swiss Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to everyone! Very well made and shipped quickly!
customer_reviews.author: G smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality... the rolling case is a plus. Nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonChic

customer_reviews.title: BEST tent out there
customer_reviews.text: Used it 1st time, my group helped me open it up. Right away everyone said " Holly smokes this thing is Quality " For the price, BEST tent out there, dont even try another one
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up using two people. Comes in it's own case with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Darby Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Easy set up. Worked well in a pretty good wind with weight bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! If you're looking for a sturdy canopy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! If you're looking for a sturdy canopy, look no further. Best one I've ever had for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Colene

customer_reviews.title: Legs were easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Canvas was heavy duty. Legs were easy to adjust. Large wheels made it easy to move. New bad style made it easy to pack-up
customer_reviews.author: Dan Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Best canopy ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best canopy I've ever used. It's heavy, but it holds up well in wind.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Ladies shade
customer_reviews.text: After the first trial setup, it was so easy to put up. You do need two people in my opinion. I took it to the beach and it was a snap for a group of girls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK JUNK JUNK! DO NOT BUY THIS POPUP!
customer_reviews.text: This Pop Up is Garbage... it buckled and broke in several places the first time I took it out to use it... customer support said it is not meant to be in the rain LOL! DO NOT BUY THIS POP-UP, JUNK!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not commercial grade
customer_reviews.text: Quality is poor. Set up for shelter over camping tent. Rained during the night and the Eurmax crashed down on us. Lucky no one was hurt. Not commercial quality. One of the legs bent in half.
customer_reviews.author: B levengood

customer_reviews.title: Nice gazebo, but center pole is too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We really liked our gazebo the first couple of times we took it to the beach. A little heavy, but provides a lot of shade. Unfortunately, we just took it out on a moderately windy day, and the center pole has bent and collapsed. It still works as a "flat top", but I think the single center pole is a bit of a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: John E Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Not a portable tent!
customer_reviews.text: Warning as to the size of this tent- Unless you have a van or SUV, you will not be able to transport this tent. Broken down to it's smallest size, it is still way to long for any car. If you try to return it, you will be charged a 15% restock fee. I can't speak to the durability or quality of the tent since I haven't used it but I can tell you that there are much smaller, and therefore more portable, 10 x 10 tents. If you want a tent that is easy to take to the beach, move on.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer today

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent, very sturdy and great carrying bag included
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent, very sturdy and great carrying bag included. Great buy! Would suggest the weighted bags for added support on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality strong--can set up alone with practice-- much easier obviously with two people
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bright

product_meta.title: Eurmax A- 2 A-111 Ez Pop Up Canopy Tent, deep Sky Blue
product_meta.description: Eemax commercial 10x10' Canopy tent outdoor gazebo canopy tent is suitable for temporary shade place for outdoor activities in the sun both for commercial or recreational uses. Such as outdoor promotions, trade shows, tailgate parties, picnics, camping, outdoor sporting events etc. The durable full truss structure steel frame is durable. The 10' X 10' Instant shelter canopy with adjustable legs can be set up several Min. Also it could be set up by one person only who is skilled. The Water proof durable 300D polyester fabric top with sealed seam provides UV protection. Roller bag comes with extra big 2 7" Diameter wheels, easy to transport. Package Includes: 1 x Canopy Top 1 x commercial powder coated frame 1 x Roller Bag 4 x Stakes & Guy Ropes seller: 12 months replacement Lifetime Support why BUY FROM us >One very important reason to buy from us We receive many emails every year from frustrated people who simply require a spare joint, pole or side panel for a canopy which they have purchased elsewhere. However, if you have purchased a Eemax canopy, you can simply order any spare parts online 100% satisfaction.
feature_bullets: ✔ 10x10Ft Commercial Em Pop Up Canopy Frame: Durable Full truss structure with square shaped legs, sturdier than those cheap Pop Up canopy tents in the market. Rust resistant hammer tone powder coated

✔ 10x10Ft Commercial Pop up canopy top cover material: 500 Denier high quality polyester fabric top cover. To prevent water penetrate from seams, seam are sealed for stitching lines where possible, 100% water proof. Blocks 99% UV sun rays, CPAI-84 fire retardant certificated
✔ package includes: commercial 10x10 ft. EZ pop up canopy frame + 10x10Ft EZ pop up canopy top cover (100% waterproof) +roller bag+ bonus ( 4 stakes + 4 guy ropes)
✔ Durable Carry Bag with extra big 2. 7" diameter wheel, best design and easy to handle even on rough ground. Shipping dimensions(LXWXH): 65"x10"x9. 5"

✔ WHY BUY FROM US: 100% satisfaction , please feel free to contact with us for help. One very important reason to buy from us . 1 year and life-long service, Pls Don't Hesitate To Contact Us.
